I mocked, polished, and articulated design decisions to founders who raised 1.3 million in funding using my designs. I also led design interns and worked with Web and Mobile Developers to create a professional website, brand identity, and mobile application.

Network Solutions

Summer 2011

I designed and developed a web and mobile application that enabled small businesses to easily create and distribute feedback campaigns. I was also responsible for directing the product vision, while presenting updates and design decisions to management and executive leadership.
